messages.title: Tom's pledges to you
content: Saving the NHS from the Tory sell off
Driving up the standard of living

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will oppose further cuts to frontline officers, prioritise neighbourhood policing and bear down on crime and its causes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will end health service privatisation, invest in publicly-provided NHS and social care for older and disabled people, and ensure parity for mental health services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Labour will build a new relationship with the EU
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will prioritize jobs, the economy, and protecting workplace rights, ensuring that Brexit will not affect them.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will build a new relationship with the EU, prioritizing jobs, the economy, and retaining the benefits of the Single Market and Customs Union.
issues.economy: Where jobs, the economy, and retaining the benefits of the Single Market and the Customs Union are our priority.
issues.education: Labour will focus on what matters most in our schools by introducing smaller class sizes.
issues.health: The NHS is in financial crisis. Labour will end health service privatisation and bring services into a secure, publicly-provided NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: Labour will introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour. Labour will invest in affordable homes to buy and rent.
issues.lawCrime: Labour will invest in frontline officers. Labour will oppose further cuts to frontline officers.

community.content: Labour will invest in affordable homes to buy and rent. Labour will build over a million new homes in five years, with at least half needed for social rent.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to stand again for the people of Salisbury and South Wiltshire. I have proudly served my local community for the last ten years as your City Councillor, speaking up on the behalf of local residents.

politicalExperience.achievements: Speaking up on behalf of local residents.

contactInformation.address: Bevan House, 148 Fisherton Street, Salisbury SP2 7QW

endorsements.endorsement: Tom has a strong track record for standing up for the people of Salisbury and South Wiltshire. He has campaigned tirelessly to protect the NHS.

quotes.text: Tom has a strong track record for standing up for the people of Salisbury and South Wiltshire. He has campaigned tirelessly to protect the NHS.
quotes.source: Salisbury resident, Clare Moody Labour MEP for the South West and Gibraltar

images.caption: Tom Corbin with Labour campaigners in Salisbury

The Tories are holding our NHS back.
The Tories are holding our NHS back.
